entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cape Race
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:04 PM NST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cape Race 6:30 PM NST Sunday 26 February 2023
Temperature: -15.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -18.9°C
Wind: NW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14 except minus 20 inland. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 14 except minus 20 inland. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14 except minus 20 inland.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the evening. Low minus 14 except minus 20 inland. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 26 February 2023
